SEARCH
Package com.fitconnet.service.interfaces.entity

Interface ActivityServiceI

All Known Implementing Classes:
ActivityServiceImpl
public interface ActivityServiceI
Interface for managing activities.

  • Method Details

    • getAll

      Optional<Set<Activity>> getAll()
      Retrieves all activities.
      Returns:
      An optional containing a set of all activities, if any.

    • getOne

      Optional<Activity> getOne(Long id)
      Retrieves an activity by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the activity to retrieve.
      Returns:
      An optional containing the activity with the specified ID, if found.

    • existById

      Boolean existById(Long id)
      Checks if an activity exists by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the activity to check.
      Returns:
      true if an activity exists with the specified ID, false otherwise.

    • existByDate

      Boolean existByDate(Date date)
      Checks if an activity exists for a given date.
      Parameters:
      date - The date to check.
      Returns:
      true if an activity exists for the given date, false otherwise.

    • activityToActivityDTO

      ActivityDTO activityToActivityDTO(Activity activity, UserDTO userDTO)
      Converts an activity entity to an activity DTO.
      Parameters:
      activity - The activity entity to convert.
      userDTO - The user DTO associated with the activity.
      Returns:
      The activity DTO corresponding to the activity entity.

    • activityDTOtoActivity

      Activity activityDTOtoActivity(ActivityDTO activityDTO, User user)
      Converts an activity DTO to an activity entity.
      Parameters:
      activityDTO - The activity DTO to convert.
      user - The user entity associated with the activity.
      Returns:
      The activity entity corresponding to the activity DTO.

    • participantsDTOtoParticipants

      Set<User> participantsDTOtoParticipants(Set<UserDTO> participantsDTO)
      Converts participant DTOs to participant entities.
      Parameters:
      participantsDTO - The set of participant DTOs to convert.
      Returns:
      The set of participant entities corresponding to the participant DTOs.

    • participantstoParticipantsDTO

      Set<UserDTO> participantstoParticipantsDTO(Set<User> participants)
      Converts participant entities to participant DTOs.
      Parameters:
      participants - The set of participant entities to convert.
      Returns:
      The set of participant DTOs corresponding to the participant entities.

    • create

      void create(Activity activity)
      Creates a new activity.
      Parameters:
      activity - The activity to create.

    • update

      void update(Long id, Activity activity)
      Updates an existing activity.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the activity to update.
      activity - The updated activity.

    • patch

      void patch(Long id, Activity activity)
      Partially updates an existing activity.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the activity to update.
      activity - The partial update for the activity.

    • deleteById

      void deleteById(Long id)
      Deletes an activity by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the activity to delete.
